line.comment: * Called at gamestart to populate pirate bases.
* Note, this is almost IDENTICAL to ZH.Pirate.SpawnBase.xml, which is used to re-spawn pirate bases throughout the game time.
* Mordan4 - don't put pirates in the renegades sector.
* Mordan8 - Set local variable on Pirate station indicating whether it will spawn a Pirate Warlord upon destruction of the station.
* Doing this at Station Creation time prevents save-scumming in order to get a warlord.

sval.val: Called at gamestart to populate pirate bases.
Note, this is almost IDENTICAL to ZH.Pirate.SpawnBase.xml, which is used to re-spawn pirate bases throughout the game time.
Mordan4 - don't put pirates in the renegades sector.
Mordan8 - Set local variable on Pirate station indicating whether it will spawn a Pirate Warlord upon destruction of the station.
Doing this at Station Creation time prevents save-scumming in order to get a warlord.
